Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Mines.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_Production] Production. Can only be built on Hills or certain resources.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If built on Luxury or Strategic resources, city will gain use of that resource.

[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Construite sur une ressource de luxe ou stratégique, permet à la ville d'utiliser cette ressource.

Odblokowuje zdolność budowniczych pozwalającą tworzyć kopalnie.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+3 do [ICON_Production] produkcji. 解鎖建造者能力來建造礦井。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_Production] 生產力。只能建造丘陵或特定資源上。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]如果建在奢侈資源或戰略資源上，城市也能使用這種資源。

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Pastures.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Production] Production.
